output:
cow.say help:

input options:
    "|":<text> - the text to display within balloon
    "|":<scriptor>, [args:{<args>}] - calls the provided scriptor with the provided args, and displays the result

output options:
    chat:<channel> - outputs text to specified channel

wrap options:
    n:true - disables word wrap. width becomes longest line. auto enables if input is multiline
    W:<number> - sets width of speech balloon. default is 40, or less if input string is shorter

cow options:
    l:true - displays a list of the available cows
    f:<cow name> - sets cow to use for this script execution. default is 'default'

visual options:
    e:<string> - eyes become specific string (recommended 2 chars long)
    b:true - eyes become ==
    d:true - eyes become XX and tongue becomes U
    g:true - eyes become $$
    p:true - eyes become @@
    s:true - eyes become ** and tongue becomes U
    t:true - eyes become --
    w:true - eyes become OO
    y:true - eyes become ..

    T:<string> - tongue becomes specified string (recommended 2 chars long)
